Card.Name: Thraben Inspector
Card.RulesText: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Card.Name: Venerable Knight
Card.RulesText: When Venerable Knight dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Knight you control.

Card.Name: Usher of the Fallen
Card.RulesText: Boast — {1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

Card.Name: Faerie Guidemother
Card.RulesText: undefined

Card.Name: Monastery Swiftspear
Card.RulesText: HasteProwess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

Card.Name: Skly Terror
Card.RulesText: undefined

Card.Name: Ajani's Pridemate
Card.RulesText: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

Card.Name: Bomat Courier
Card.RulesText: HasteWhenever Bomat Courier attacks, exile the top card of your library face down. (You can't look at it.){R}, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Bomat Courier: Put all cards exiled with Bomat Courier into their owners' hands.

Card.Name: Chamber Sentry
Card.RulesText: Chamber Sentry enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.{X}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Chamber Sentry: It deals X damage to any target.{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Return Chamber Sentry from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Mantis Rider
Card.RulesText: Flying, vigilance, haste

Card.Name: Glorybringer
Card.RulesText: Flying, hasteYou may exert Glorybringer as it attacks. When you do, it deals 4 damage to target non-Dragon creature an opponent controls. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

Card.Name: Halvar, God Of Battle
Card.Type: Legendary Creature — God // Legendary Artifact — Equipment
Card.RulesText: undefined

Card.Name: Adult Gold Dragon
Card.RulesText: Flying, lifelink, haste

Card.Name: Legion's Landing
Card.RulesText: undefined

Card.Name: Defiant Strike
Card.RulesText: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.Draw a card.

Card.Name: Shock
Card.RulesText: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Samut's Sprint
Card.RulesText: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

Card.Name: Lightning Strike
Card.RulesText: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Skewer the Critics
Card.RulesText: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Maul of The Skyclaves
Card.RulesText: When Maul of the Skyclaves enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and first strike.Equip {2}{W}{W}

Card.Name: Kaya's Onslaught
Card.RulesText: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

Card.Name: Warleader's Helix
Card.RulesText: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

Card.Name: Showdown of the Skalds
Card.RulesText: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)I — Exile the top four cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.II, III — Whenever you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Card.Name: The Akroan War
Card.RulesText: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)I — Gain control of target creature for as long as The Akroan War remains on the battlefield.II — Until your next turn, creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.III — Each tapped creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

Card.Name: Castle Ardenvale
Card.RulesText: Castle Ardenvale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains.{T}: Add {W}.{2}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

Card.Name: Mystic Monastery
Card.RulesText: Mystic Monastery enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.

Card.RulesText: undefined

Card.Name: Sacred Foundry
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: Mutavault
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}.{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

Card.Name: Steam Vents
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: Hallowed Fountain
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
